name: Dead Fate
description:
All of us have been destined to meet our fate in the end of our life. With this game, you can fight your destiny or fate by reaching the end of the game. If you can win the challenge, you will be guaranteed to get great life changing fate, else you will get even worse than the current one that you will be face!

Test your destiny and get the best result for your future! Play together with up to 5 friends and share your destiny with your mates!

Features :

- Online Multiplayer up to 5 players in 1 server

- Uniquely Design Level

- Surprising Great & Bad Fate Wishes 

This Project is meant to be played on Android Devices. This project was created for game jam purpose. The assets in this game are built with zero funding and captured from unity default sprites , self-drawn and royalty free sounds websites .
